attributes.action: Send assistance to Turkey in combating the mass wildfires
attributes.background: The world is on the brink of a climate crisis. We should do anything and everything in our power to aide in stopping threats to the global ecosystem. Turkey's wildfires need to be stopped immediately and this will only happen with the backing of other countries like the UK.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: 

Help Turkey with the wildfires
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593834
